item.title: Unicorn!
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

meh, community members gloating at us, they always “forget” to give rep, but I know what they’re really thinking

anyway back to the script, I’v uses some canvasses to make it draw on the debug image instead of notepad, I still used your unicorn drawing

{.Script Info:
# ScriptName  = Unicorn! with Canvasses
# Author      = yakman
# Description = Pretty cool little thing.
# Version     = Art V1
# Date        = N/A
# Comments    = This thing is funny. Actual drawing created by mod robby
/Script Info}

program Unicornnotepad;

const
 BackColor = 0;
 FrontColor = 255;
            //65280
            //16711680
 DrawSpeed = 2;
 TextHeight = 10;
 YStrech = 1.3;
 
 Width = 600;
 Height= 703;

var
 Message:array[1..50]of string;

procedure LoadArray;
begin
message[1] :='                                                                                  tttt              ';
message[2] :='                                                                                  ttDD              ';
message[3] :='                                                                                iiKK;;              ';
message[4] :='                                                                        ::  ::ttKKtt                ';
message[5] :='                                                              iijjttiiiiGG..LLKKLL                  ';
message[6] :='                                  ..........................ttii....;;iiiiLLKKEE;;                  ';
message[7] :='                        ..........                      ;;ii....iiii;;iittiiGGjjii                  ';
message[8] :='                              ....                    ii;;ii..;;ii;;..ttLLttii;;tt....              ';
message[9] :='                              ..ii                  ..ttttii;;..tt....ii  ii;;tt::ii  ..iiii        ';
message[10] :='                                                    iiii;;  ....ffiiii;;  ..iiii  ;;    ..;;..      ';
message[11] :='                                                    ii;;;;..;;..;;ii;;;;..DD;;    ii          ..    ';
message[12] :='                                          ........;;ffffii..ii..;;ii              ;;..          ..  ';
message[13] :='                    ....................;;........iittii;;..ii....tt                ii          ..  ';
message[14] :='          ............  ..................          iiii,,..tt..;;;;  tt            ii..          ..';
message[15] :='  ........    ..........                          iittii::..;;..ii  ;;ii;;            ii          ..';
message[16] :='..                                                ttii......ii..iiiitt  ;;iiii      ..;;..        ..';
message[17] :='                                          ..      ttii  ....ttffttff;;      ..ii,,..KK;;..        ..';
message[18] :='                    ;;            ........ff......iitt;;  ..ii;;    ;;        ..;;ttttii        ..  ';
message[19] :='                    ii............        ..      ff..;;;;jjii      ..;;      ....;;ii          ..  ';
message[20] :='            ..........                          ..tt....LL;;          ii      ....            ..    ';
message[21] :='      ......                                  ..ii....;;tt              ii  ....          ff..      ';
message[22] :='  ....                                        ii....  ;;ii              ii......        ..ii        ';
message[23] :='                                          ;;iiii;;....iiii              ;;;;..      ....            ';
message[24] :='                              ,,;;;;;;;;ii..    ;;iiiiii;;ff..            ii    ....                ';
message[25] :='                  ;;;;;;  ..ii..                    iittttiiii      ;;    tt;;..                    ';
message[26] :='              ..ffjjiittfftt                          tt;;tt;;      ;;    iiii,,                    ';
message[27] :='              LLttiittffff                            ;;;;;;        ;;  ;;..  ;;iiii                ';
message[28] :='            ttii..tt;;..,,                                ;;        ;;;;ii          ;;ii..          ';
message[29] :='            iiff..jj  ;;                                  ..;;        iiii;;..          ii          ';
message[30] :='            iitt..tt  ;;                                    ii;;        ii;;;;;;;;;;ii..;;::        ';
message[31] :='            ;;ff..jj..ii                                      ;;jj;;      ;;;;        iiiiKK..      ';
message[32] :='            ttiiii..jj;;..                                  iiii  ::ii..    ;;::      ..DDLLff      ';
message[33] :='          ..LL..ff;;..iitt;;iijj..      ..::            iiii          ii;;    ;;        iiGGii,,    ';
message[34] :='    ..  ....LLii;;ffiiii;;iiiittff..    ii..;;;;ii;;;;;;                ii    ii          ii  ii....';
message[35] :='    ::..    ,,GG;;  ;;ii;;;;iiiiiitt    ;;    ;;,,                      ;;  ii        ....,,LLtt    ';
message[36] :='    ff        ttLLii;;;;ii::    iiii  ;;..  ..ii                      ..GGfftt........    jj####..  ';
message[37] :='  ....          ttGGtt;;;;iiii;;iitt  ii  ..ii        ;;..    ........;;GGDD;;            ;;####tt  ';
message[38] :='....              ttDDGGffttttff..iiii....ii..........tt;;......      iittff                ii##tt  ';
message[39] :='..                ....ffiiiiiiiiiiLL;;;;ii            ..              ;;  ;;                  ..    ';
message[40] :='..                ..    jj;;jjffff;;  ii                            ffff;;;;        ii              ';
message[41] :='..                  ....;;ffii..jj....;;                          ii##WWii  ........tt    ........  ';
message[42] :='..                    ....fftttt;;ii  LL......      ..............tt##WW....  ............          ';
message[43] :='..                        ..;;;;;;;;DDGGff..  ......      ........ii##tt........                    ';
message[44] :='  ..                        LLGGGG  jjGGff................          ..                              ';
message[45] :='    ..                      ttGGDD    ii;;..              ..                                        ';
message[46] :='      ....                    ttii..  tt..ii            ;;ii                                        ';
message[47] :='        ......tt              ii  iiff##;;;;              ..                                        ';
message[48] :='            ..tt..          ttWWii;;jj##WW..                                                        ';
message[49] :='                            ii##WW....LLtt........................                                  ';
message[50] :='                         KKff                                                                  ';
end;

procedure DrawUnicorn;
var bmp,yPos,f:Integer; can:TCanvas;
begin
bmp:= BitmapFromString(Width,Height,'');
can:= GetBitmapCanvas(bmp);

can.brush.color:= BackColor;
can.brush.style:= bsSolid;
can.pen.color:= BackColor;
can.pen.width:= 1;
can.rectangle(0,0,Width,Height);

can.Font.Color:= FrontColor;
can.Font.Size:= TextHeight;

yPos:= 2;
for f:=1 to 50 do
 begin
 can.TextOut(50,yPos,message[f]);
 yPos:= Round(yPos + (TextHeight*YStrech));
 CopyCanvas(can,GetDebugCanvas,0,0,Width,Height,0,0,Width,Height);
 wait(DrawSpeed);
 end

end;


begin
LoadArray;
DisplayDebugImgWindow(Width,Height);
DrawUnicorn;
end.

Read full topic

item.title: Unicorn!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Rune Hacker:

What is cm?? And god…50! I havent even gotten 1 from soemone yet lol.

Community Member

mod robby:

I can’t rep people… either. I think only the CM’s can.

You need 15 rep to rep someone else. Every time you get another 15 rep you can add another 1 rep point to someone.

So
If you have 15 rep you can give someone 1 rep point.
If you have 30 rep you can give someone 2 rep points.
45 = 3

and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: Unicorn!
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

only problem i see is that you have repeat and until(false) in the main loop. That means it will type the picture over and over and over i believe. Removing the repeat and until(false) will type it once and stop. I havent tried it, but i think that would be better.

Read full topic

item.title: Unicorn!
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

I made a unicorn. It took me about an hour. Basically all you have to do is open up a note pad and maximize it then click the note pad and wait about 5 seconds and it will start making a unicorn!

PLEASE LEAVE FEEDBACK!

{.Script Info:
# ScriptName  = Unicorn!
# Author      = mod robby
# Description = Pretty cool little thing.
# Version     = Art V1
# Date        = N/A
# Comments    = This thing is funny.
# DONT LEACH THIS PLEASE. Make your own.
/Script Info}

program Unicornnotepad;
const
message1 ='                                                                                  tttt              ';
message2 ='                                                                                  ttDD              ';
message3 ='                                                                                iiKK;;              ';
message4 ='                                                                        ::  ::ttKKtt                ';
message5 ='                                                              iijjttiiiiGG..LLKKLL                  ';
message6 ='                                  ..........................ttii....;;iiiiLLKKEE;;                  ';
message7 ='                        ..........                      ;;ii....iiii;;iittiiGGjjii                  ';
message8 ='                              ....                    ii;;ii..;;ii;;..ttLLttii;;tt....              ';
message9 ='                              ..ii                  ..ttttii;;..tt....ii  ii;;tt::ii  ..iiii        ';
message10 ='                                                    iiii;;  ....ffiiii;;  ..iiii  ;;    ..;;..      ';
message11 ='                                                    ii;;;;..;;..;;ii;;;;..DD;;    ii          ..    ';
message12 ='                                          ........;;ffffii..ii..;;ii              ;;..          ..  ';
message13 ='                    ....................;;........iittii;;..ii....tt                ii          ..  ';
message14 ='          ............  ..................          iiii,,..tt..;;;;  tt            ii..          ..';
message15 ='  ........    ..........                          iittii::..;;..ii  ;;ii;;            ii          ..';
message16 ='..                                                ttii......ii..iiiitt  ;;iiii      ..;;..        ..';
message17 ='                                          ..      ttii  ....ttffttff;;      ..ii,,..KK;;..        ..';
message18 ='                    ;;            ........ff......iitt;;  ..ii;;    ;;        ..;;ttttii        ..  ';
message19 ='                    ii............        ..      ff..;;;;jjii      ..;;      ....;;ii          ..  ';
message20 ='            ..........                          ..tt....LL;;          ii      ....            ..    ';
message21 ='      ......                                  ..ii....;;tt              ii  ....          ff..      ';
message22 ='  ....                                        ii....  ;;ii              ii......        ..ii        ';
message23 ='                                          ;;iiii;;....iiii              ;;;;..      ....            ';
message24 ='                              ,,;;;;;;;;ii..    ;;iiiiii;;ff..            ii    ....                ';
message25 ='                  ;;;;;;  ..ii..                    iittttiiii      ;;    tt;;..                    ';
message26 ='              ..ffjjiittfftt                          tt;;tt;;      ;;    iiii,,                    ';
message27 ='              LLttiittffff                            ;;;;;;        ;;  ;;..  ;;iiii                ';
message28 ='            ttii..tt;;..,,                                ;;        ;;;;ii          ;;ii..          ';
message29 ='            iiff..jj  ;;                                  ..;;        iiii;;..          ii          ';
message30 ='            iitt..tt  ;;                                    ii;;        ii;;;;;;;;;;ii..;;::        ';
message31 ='            ;;ff..jj..ii                                      ;;jj;;      ;;;;        iiiiKK..      ';
message32 ='            ttiiii..jj;;..                                  iiii  ::ii..    ;;::      ..DDLLff      ';
message33 ='          ..LL..ff;;..iitt;;iijj..      ..::            iiii          ii;;    ;;        iiGGii,,    ';
message34 ='    ..  ....LLii;;ffiiii;;iiiittff..    ii..;;;;ii;;;;;;                ii    ii          ii  ii....';
message35 ='    ::..    ,,GG;;  ;;ii;;;;iiiiiitt    ;;    ;;,,                      ;;  ii        ....,,LLtt    ';
message36 ='    ff        ttLLii;;;;ii::    iiii  ;;..  ..ii                      ..GGfftt........    jj####..  ';
message37 ='  ....          ttGGtt;;;;iiii;;iitt  ii  ..ii        ;;..    ........;;GGDD;;            ;;####tt  ';
message38 ='....              ttDDGGffttttff..iiii....ii..........tt;;......      iittff                ii##tt  ';
message39 ='..                ....ffiiiiiiiiiiLL;;;;ii            ..              ;;  ;;                  ..    ';
message40 ='..                ..    jj;;jjffff;;  ii                            ffff;;;;        ii              ';
message41 ='..                  ....;;ffii..jj....;;                          ii##WWii  ........tt    ........  ';
message42 ='..                    ....fftttt;;ii  LL......      ..............tt##WW....  ............          ';
message43 ='..                        ..;;;;;;;;DDGGff..  ......      ........ii##tt........                    ';
message44 ='  ..                        LLGGGG  jjGGff................          ..                              ';
message45 ='    ..                      ttGGDD    ii;;..              ..                                        ';
message46 ='      ....                    ttii..  tt..ii            ;;ii                                        ';
message47 ='        ......tt              ii  iiff##;;;;              ..                                        ';
message48 ='            ..tt..          ttWWii;;jj##WW..                                                        ';
message49 ='                            ii##WW....LLtt........................                                  ';
message50 ='                              KKff                                                                  ';
begin
  Writeln('5');
wait(1000)
  Writeln('4');
wait(1000)
  Writeln('3');
wait(1000)
  Writeln('2');
wait(1000)
  Writeln('unicorn!');
repeat
wait(5000)
sendkeys(message1 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message2 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message3 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message4 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message5 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message6 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message7 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message8 + chr(13));

sendkeys(message11 + chr(13));

sendkeys(message13 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message14 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message15 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message16 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message17 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message18 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message19 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message20 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message21 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message22 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message23 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message24 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message25 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message26 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message27 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message28 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message29 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message30 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message31 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message32 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message33 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message34 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message35 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message36 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message37 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message38 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message39 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message40 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message41 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message42 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message43 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message44 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message45 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message46 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message47 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message48 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message49 + chr(13));
sendkeys(message50 + chr(13));


until(false)
end.

Also this is my second script i have made
